command
Class CommandManager

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--command.CommandManager
public class CommandManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a command manager for a set of commands. It looks manages metacommands such as "undo", "redo" and "history" and it dispatches the execution of regular commands.

This implementation limits the history (number of undoable commands) to 10, but it would be easy to make the history unbounded.
